# List Territories

**Web Service Endpoint**

List all territories where the App Store operates.

## Getting Territories

- **List All Territories for an End User License Agreement**: List all the App Store territories to which a specific custom app license agreement applies.
- **GET /v1/endUserLicenseAgreements/{id}/relationships/territories**
